I am currently working as a consultant in __*Biostatistics*__ in the field of genetics, *i.e.*, proteomics, metabolomics, transcriptomics, *etc.* in Lille & Paris, France.  
Additionally, I am also a __*freelance*__, available for hire to work on __*{{< iconify fa6-brands r-project >}} and Quarto related projects*__.  
I have developed a few {{< iconify fa6-brands r-project >}}&nbsp;packages (_e.g._,&nbsp;[insane](https://github.com/mcanouil/insane), [NACHO](https://github.com/mcanouil/NACHO)), and although some are not very useful, they are most definitely entertaining (_i.e._,&nbsp;[ggpacman](https://github.com/mcanouil/ggpacman)).  
I also enjoy watching movies and playing with {{< iconify fa6-brands r-project >}} ([github.com/mcanouil/imdb-ratings](https://github.com/mcanouil/imdb-ratings)).  
Finally, as the main organiser of the [R Lille](https://rlille.fr/) ([{{< iconify fa6-brands twitter >}}@RLille_RUG](https://twitter.com/RLille_RUG)) {{< iconify fa6-brands r-project >}} User Group, I organised [Meetups&nbsp;{{< iconify fa6-brands meetup >}}](https://www.meetup.com/R-Lille/) on pretty much anything related to {{< iconify fa6-brands r-project >}}.

Have a look at my complete [_{{< iconify fa6-solid file-alt >}} curriculum vitae_](https://m.canouil.dev/curriculum-vitae/).
